codex/addon-git.name: codex/addon-git
codex/addon-git.description: The Git addon provides Codex the means to fetch documentation from Github/Bitbucket repositories.

codex/addon-phpdoc.name: codex/addon-phpdoc
codex/addon-phpdoc.description: The Phpdoc addon provides Codex the means to parse the phpdoc generated xml file and integrate documenation in a user-friendly way.

codex/addon-auth.name: codex/addon-auth
codex/addon-auth.description: Authentication / Access control addon for Codex. Works with github/bitbucket login. Define groups that can access the docs.
